channel.title: Making Objects in different Slots, and Adding Strength Bonuses
channel.description: Ok, i want to have a dragon dagger set in your other hand, like in FinalBarrage, and how do i add Strength Bonuses to items. I wanna make Desert Boots, and Dragon Dagger each 20+ Str (like FinalBarrage) The reason i want all this like that is because i want to bring back my favourite server. And also, how do i make it so you can weild a shield with d claws. like Dfs and D Claws. Thanks if you can help

item.title: Making Objects in different Slots, and Adding Strength Bonuses
item.dc:creator: @lover854 lover854
item.description:
@lover854 wrote:

no for 2h u have to search in client.java for

int[] two_hand = {

and delete the claw id there

Read full topic
item.source: Making Objects in different Slots, and Adding Strength Bonuses

item.title: Making Objects in different Slots, and Adding Strength Bonuses
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Item.java for switching the equip position.

Item.cfg for switching the strength bonus. (The strength bonus is usually the 2nd to last number. Make sure you do not use spaces anywhere if you alter the file, and tabs instead.

Read full topic
item.source: Making Objects in different Slots, and Adding Strength Bonuses
